mapper.sql: CpuCores, MemorySize, HardDiskSize, MesSaveTime, MessageNum, OutPatientNum, ServiceNum
mapper.select:
select MemorySize from JHSER_Config_DB.MessageNum
and ID = #{id}
mapper.update: CREATE MODEL MsgMode PREDICTING (MessageNum) WITH ( OutPatientNum int, ServiceNum int) FROM JHSER_Config_DB.MessageNum
CREATE MODEL CpuMode PREDICTING (CpuCores) WITH ( MessageNum int, ServiceNum int) FROM JHSER_Config_DB.MessageNum
CREATE MODEL MemoryMode PREDICTING (MemorySize) WITH ( MessageNum int, ServiceNum int) FROM JHSER_Config_DB.MessageNum
CREATE MODEL HardDiskMode PREDICTING (HardDiskSize) WITH ( MessageNum int, MesSaveTime int) FROM JHSER_Config_DB.MessageNum
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JHSER_Config_DB.MessageNum( CpuCores, HardDiskSize, MemorySize, MesSaveTime, MessageNum, OutPatientNum, ServiceNum) VALUES (#{cpuCores},#{HardDiskSize},#{MemorySize},#{MesSaveTime},#{MessageNum},#{OutPatientNum},#{ServiceNum})

INSERT INTO JHSER_Config_DB.MessageNum( CpuCores, HardDiskSize, MemorySize, MesSaveTime, MessageNum, OutPatientNum, ServiceNum) VALUES
( #{element.CpuCores}, #{element.HardDiskSize}, #{element.MemorySize}, #{element.MesSaveTime}, #{element.MessageNum}, #{element.OutPatientNum}, #{element.ServiceNum} )
INSERT INTO JHSER_Config_DB.Server( MesSaveTime, MessageNum, OutPatientNum, ServiceNum) VALUES (#{MesSaveTime},#{MessageNum},#{OutPatientNum},#{ServiceNum})
mapper.select: SELECT top 1 MesSaveTime, MessageNum, OutPatientNum,ServiceNum, PREDICT(MsgMode) MsgMode , PREDICT(CpuMode) CpuMode , PREDICT(MemoryMode) MemoryMode , PREDICT(HardDiskMode) HardDiskMode FROM JHSER_Config_DB.Server order by id desc
